starting_popup_en.label: beta1
starting_popup_en.title: Welcome
starting_popup_en.message: Welcome and thank you for downloading Sharp'Eye.

starting_popup_en.label: beta2
starting_popup_en.title: Welcome
starting_popup_en.message: Our goal is to assist you during your daily road trip to make the road a safer place.

starting_popup_en.label: beta3
starting_popup_en.title: Beta
starting_popup_en.message: Please keep in mind that the app is currently in beta, if you encounter any problem, please make a report by using the "feedback" section.

starting_popup_en.label: beta3
starting_popup_en.title: Responsability
starting_popup_en.message: We remind you that using Sharp'Eye do not exempt you from your duties as a driver.

starting_popup_en.label: beta4
starting_popup_en.title: GDPR
starting_popup_en.message: We don't collect any personal data, however if a problem occurs on your app, an error report will be sent to us to improve Sharp'eye.

starting_popup_en.label: beta5
starting_popup_en.title: Tips
starting_popup_en.message: You can at anytime, enable or disable the Sharp'Eye features from the menu.

starting_popup_en.label: beta6
starting_popup_en.title: Network
starting_popup_en.message: Feel free to join our social networks from the tab "about".
